price: Isheen tun gorsa. Nama fedhe gara Gooftaa isaatti karaa godhata.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi tadhkiratun faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlan
